pages.text: $(8)The fishing system can be used from the very first moment you create your world.$(br2)To start fishing, use 'Shift + Right-click' while looking at a river or an ocean using your claws. $(br2)You won't be able to fish in small puddles or too shallow rivers, so make sure you are at a good river or ocean to be able to fish.$(br)
pages.title: Fishing

pages.text: $(8)Fishing will always provide you food wherever you are!
